trans-unit.source: Represents a set of one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"></xref> elements.
A StoryFragments element defines the structure and content of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
StoryFragments is the root of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> elements.

For detailed information about the document structure of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* that can be downloaded from the [Windows Hardware Developer Central](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"></xref> to add.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
Adds a child object to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
Only a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> and there must be at least one child.
The child object to add.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
The text to add to the object.
